Package net.proteusframework.internet.servlet.filter

Servlet filters.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthFilter
    A filter implementation that provides HTTP authentication using a DataStore.
    AuthHelper
    Helper class for AuthFilter.
    AuthState
    State information.
    ClientLog4JFilter
    Log4J filter.
    HibernateSessionHandlerFilter
    Configures hibernate sessions for implementations of HibernateSessionAcceptor in a web context.
    RequestResponseLogFilter
    Filter to log request and responses.
    RequestResponseLogFilter.LoggingInputStream
    An input stream that logs what is read.
    RequestResponseLogFilter.RequestWrapper
    Wraps a request to output the content.
    RequestResponseLogFilter.ResponseWrapper
    Wraps the response.
    RequestResponseLogFilter.Stream
    Writes the response wrapper header on the first write.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthHelper.AuthenticationStatus
    Authentication Status.
